 Previous experience (part-time work, student projects, labs in IT/Tech etc.) and involvement during your studies are advantageous but
 **what matters most is your potential and passion** 
 .
   

  

 In our recruitment, SEB behaviours are something we consider when choosing whom to hire. These behaviours include creating value, acting long-term, and building positive relationships.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

* A six-month trainee programme, designed for professional and personal development
* A full-time employment in the role you have been hired for, after completing the programme successfully
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Networking and collaboration opportunities
* A real business challenge to solve with other participants in the Tech Trainee and International Trainee programmes, where you can create value and make a difference for SEB
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Mentorship from senior leaders


**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 The application period for the Tech Trainee programme is open until 11th January 2026 23:59 CET.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position, please contact career@seb.se, but we will not process applications via e-mail.
   

  

 The Tech Trainee Programme will start on 1st September 2026.
   

  

**Our recruitment process**
 We want to get to know you, and for you to get to know us.
   

  

**The Recruitment Process Includes**
* Psychometric tests
* Interviews – digitally and/or on-site
* A case exercise and presentation
* SEB Day – an event to learn more about SEB and the programme, with insights from former trainees


 Please note that the Alva Labs assessments will be connected to the email you applied with.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and history of crime. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, which is why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Find out more about the Tech Trainee Programme here: Tech Programme | SEB
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Dev Ops / IT Engineer Contractor, Stockholm
description:
**Contract DevOps / IT Engineer (3 Months, Start ASAP)** 

  






 We’re looking for an experienced contract DevOps / IT engineer
 


 to support our first game release here at Off-Leash Interactive. This role is on-site in our office in Stockholm.
 




  






 It is a 3-month engagement, starting as soon as possible. The role is focused on keeping our development infrastructure stable, secure, and efficient - eliminating unwanted development downtime. Many of our systems are already in place, and we don’t anticipate the focus of the role to be on setting up something new.
 




  




**Scope of Work** 

  




* Maintain and support development infrastructure and internal IT systems
* Own and support
 
**Perforce** 

 (Helix Core) administration and troubleshooting
* Manage build machines, CI/CD pipelines, and automation where applicable
* Support developer workflows (workstations, access, permissions, backups)
* Monitor system health, uptime, and storage
* Troubleshoot production-impacting issues quickly and pragmatically



  




**Required Experience** 

  




* Prior, hands-on experience administering Perforce (mandatory)
* Strong DevOps background
* Experience with pipelines and build infrastructure
* Solid understanding of networking, security, and access control
* Comfortable working independently with minimal oversight
* Proven ability to diagnose and fix issues under time pressure
* Experience supporting game development studio(s)



  




**Nice to Have** 

  




* Familiarity with Unreal Engine workflows
* Experience with supporting Release Management



  




**Contract Details** 

  




* **Contract length:** 

 3 months
* **Start:** 

 ASAP
* **Type:** 

 Contract / freelance
* **Location:** 

 On-site in our office in Stockholm
* **Time commitment:** 

 To be agreed (part-time or near full-time)


**How to Apply** 


 Please send your application to
 
 jobs@offleashinteractive.se
 




 We’re looking for someone senior, reliable, and pragmatic who can step in quickly and keep things running smoothly.

title: Cloud Architect Azure
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
**Vill du arbeta på en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser?**
 Sopra Steria, Nordens ledande företag inom digital transformation, söker en erfaren och kompetent Cloud Architect inom Azure med dokumenterad erfarenhet för att stärka vårt framstående team. Vi har blivit erkända som Karriärföretag och en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser 2025 av Great Place to Work. I denna roll kommer du att spela en avgörande roll i leveransen av innovativa molnbaserade projekt till våra kunder samt bidra till vidareutvecklingen av vårt framstående molnerbjudande
   

  

**Som Arkitektkonsult Inom Azure Kommer Du Att**
* Delta aktivt i planering, design och implementation av Azure-lösningar för våra kunder.
* Operativt arbeta med lösningar som omfattar hela bredden av Azure-plattformen, inklusive IaaS och PaaS, med fokus på Entra ID för identitets- och åtkomststyrning.
* Coacha och vägleda kunder om optimal användning av moln- och hybridteknologi för att implementera nya lösningar eller migrera befintliga tjänster till Azure.
* Fungera som ämnesexpert som stödjer flera team eller som teknisk teamledare med övergripande ansvar för leveransen.


**För att lyckas med detta tror vi att du:**
* Minst 5 års dokumenterad erfarenhet som Azure-arkitekt med stark tekniskt fokus och problemlösningsförmåga.
* Utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter på svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* Förmåga att automatisera och optimera arbetsflöden.
* Erfarenhet av att översätta kundens behov till konkreta designförslag och implementeringar.
* Erfarenhet från konsultbranschen med förmåga att arbeta i både stora och små team.


**Kvalifikationer Och Färdigheter**
* Erfarenhet av design och implementering av lösningar i det publika molnet, med fokus på kostnadsoptimering, säkerhet, skalbarhet, prestanda och tillgänglighet.
* Kompetens inom programmerings- och/eller skriptspråk (Powershell, Bash, Python etc.).
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-verktyg som Azure DevOps eller GitHub.
* Erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code (ARM, Bicep, Terraform etc.).
* Förståelse och erfarenhet av ramverk som Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework, Security Adoption Framework samt Well-Architected Framework
* Kunskap inom molnsäkerhet och Zero Trust arkitektur.
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av containerlösningar som Docker och Kubernetes är meriterande.


**Om Sopra Steria**
 Sopra Steria är en global aktör inom digital transformation med över 50 000 medarbetare i över 30 länder, varav 600 i Sverige. Vi har blivit rankade som en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser 2025 av Great Place to Work och är ett av topp fem bolag inom Digital Transformation enligt Gartner. Vi erbjuder en inkluderande och skicklig arbetsmiljö där du har möjlighet att vässa dina kunskaper och arbeta med branschens mest spännande projekt. Vi står nu inför en spännande tillväxtresa som genomsyrar hela verksamheten där det finns stora möjligheter att växa tillsammans med bolaget och skapa verklig förändring genom digital utveckling.
   

  

 Har du fler frågor? Om du har några fler frågor angående tjänsten får du gärna höra av dig till ansvarig rekryterare Teodor Nellvik (teodor.nellvik@soprasteria.com).
   

  

 På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation.
   

  

 Sopra Steria tar inte emot CV:n från företag som vi inte har ramavtal tillsammans med. Vi tar inte ansvar för eventuella avgifter på CV:n som skickas oönskat till oss. To all recruitment agencies without a base agreement: Sopra Steria does not accept resumes from agencies with whom we do not have an agreement. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Sopra Steria employees or any other company location. Sopra Steria is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: SEB Tech Trainee Programme 2026-27: Telephony Cloud Engineer | SEB, Stockholm
description:
**Do you want to challenge, change, and steer our company into the future? Are you passionate about technology and ready to make a difference? Then you will thrive at SEB.**
 At SEB, we believe in fresh thinking, new working methods, and innovation to create a fairer and more sustainable world. Since SEB was founded in 1856, our focus on customers and long-term relationships has been at the heart of our success, while we place a strong emphasis on sustainability and digitalization as we shape the future of SEB.
   

  

 With the Tech Trainee Programme and as an employee, we'll help you develop new skills and take on more responsibility to create a positive impact.
 **You will become a crucial key player in shaping the future of the bank.**
 Your Tech Trainee position and your team
   

  

 We believe that modern cloud solutions enable smarter ways of working with data and help us deliver innovative telephony services to our customers. We are on a journey to modernize our infrastructure and transition toward cloud-based solutions.
   

  

**Skills**
 You will join a senior team and contribute to the development of our future telephony platform.
 **You’ll gain hands-on experience and grow your skills in** 
 :
   

  

* Infrastructure planning and cloud readiness
* Understanding telephony systems and services
* Collaborating with stakeholders and technical teams
* Supporting automation and operational best practices


 Our team delivers corporate telephony, digital meeting, and contact center services to over 16,000 users across 20 countries. We’re continuously evolving our services to provide the best possible experience for SEB employees and our end customers.
   

  

 Simultaneously by working in the role you are being recruited to,
 **you will participate in SEB's Tech Trainee Programme for six months** 
 . It will give you the opportunity to develop an extensive network within the bank, gain a deep understanding of the financial industry and our global tech organization, and be professionally and personally challenged.
   

  

 As part of the programme, you can expect to: contribute to meaningful projects, work on tech tracks, gain communication and leadership skills, and participate in a hackathon and a business challenge.
   

  

 Key traits to thrive in this role and programme
   

  

 We’re looking for young talents who are curious, motivated, and ready to question the status quo.
   

  

**To thrive in this role and in the Tech Trainee Programme, we believe you have:**
* Graduated within the past two years, or will graduate before the programme starts on 1st September 2026 – from a relevant academic degree or a two-year vocational education in IT or tech
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, and the ability to take ownership
* Great communication skills and to be able to work in English
* Computer Science, Information Technology, of Software Engineering
* Cloud computing or DevOps
* Experience with programming, cloud platforms, or telephony systems is a plus - but not required.


 Most importantly, you're motivated to grow and contribute to real-world projects in a collaborative environment.
   

  

 Previous experience (part-time work, student projects, labs in IT/Tech etc.) and involvement during your studies are advantageous but
 **what matters most is your potential and passion** 
 .
   

  

 In our recruitment, SEB behaviours are something we consider when choosing whom to hire. These behaviours include creating value, acting long-term, and building positive relationships.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

* A six-month trainee programme, designed for professional and personal development
* A full-time employment in the role you have been hired for, after completing the programme successfully
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Networking and collaboration opportunities
* Hands-on experience with real-world cybersecurity challenges.
* A real business challenge to solve with other participants in the Tech Trainee and International Trainee programmes, where you can create value and make a difference for SEB
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Mentorship from senior leaders


**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 The application period for the Tech Trainee programme is open until 11th January 2026 23:59 CET.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position, please contact career@seb.se, but we will not process applications via e-mail.
   

  

 The Tech Trainee Programme will start on 1st September 2026.
   

  

**Our recruitment process**
 We want to get to know you, and for you to get to know us.
   

  

**The Recruitment Process Includes**
* Psychometric tests
* Interviews – digitally and/or on-site
* A case exercise and presentation
* SEB Day – an event to learn more about SEB and the programme, with insights from former trainees


 Please note that the Alva Labs assessments will be connected to the email you applied with.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and history of crime. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, which is why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Find out more about the Tech Trainee Programme here: Tech Programme | SEB
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: SEB International Trainee Programme 2026-27: Project Management | SEB, Stockholm
description:
**Do you want to challenge, change, and steer our company into the future? Are you ready to make your mark on the finance industry and positively shape the world? Then you will thrive at SEB.**
 At SEB, we believe in fresh thinking, new working methods, and innovation to create a fairer and more sustainable world. Since SEB was founded in 1856, our focus on customers and long-term relationships has been at the heart of our success, while sustainability and digitalization influence our long-term strategy. With the International Trainee Programme and as an employee, we'll help you develop new skills and take on more responsibility to create a positive impact.
 **You will become a crucial key player in shaping the future of the bank** 
 .
   

  

 Your Trainee position and your team
   

  

**Ready to revolutionize how we deliver technology at scale?** 
 Join our team in the department of Project Management & Lean Agile Center of Excellence at SEB Group Technology and help us transform our delivery organization through AI and data-driven insights.
   

  

 We're seeking a passionate individual to pioneer AI-powered solutions that will transform our delivery organization. You'll work at the intersection of data science, AI, and agile delivery practices to revolutionize the way we work.
   

  

**As a Trainee In Our Team, You Will**
* Identify opportunities to automate and enhance our core delivery processes including product development framework, portfolio management, and decision processes
* Aim to build a data-driven delivery culture that maximizes flow, throughput, and value delivery across our entire technology organization


**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* Map and implement AI use cases across our delivery organization, focusing on tools and solutions that empower chief scrum masters, chief product owners, program managers and engineering managers to make better, faster decisions
* Design and prototype automation solutions for key delivery processes including our product development framework, Portfolio management, and intake processes
* Build comprehensive KPI frameworks that measure and optimize flow efficiency, throughput, cycle time, and value delivery across teams and portfolios
* Create intelligent dashboards, analytics and advanced simulation capabilities that provide real-time insights into delivery performance, bottlenecks, delivery prognosis and improvement opportunities
* Experiment with generative AI to automate routine tasks like status reporting, risk identification, and dependency mapping
* Collaborate with delivery leaders across divisions to understand pain points and co-create solutions that drive meaningful improvements
* Establish data-driven practices that help teams make evidence-based decisions and continuously improve their delivery capabilities


 Simultaneously by working in the role you are being recruited to,
 **you will participate in SEB's International Trainee Programme for nine months.** 
 It will give you the opportunity to develop an extensive network within the bank, gain a deep understanding of the financial industry and be professionally and personally challenged.
   

  

 As part of the programme, you can expect to: contribute to meaningful projects, work on communication and leadership skills, do rotations in other teams across the bank, participate in a business challenge and do an international internship at another SEB site in the world.
   

  

 Key traits to thrive in this role and programme
   

  

 We’re looking for young talents who are curious, motivated, and ready to question the status quo.
   

  

**To thrive in this role and in the International Trainee programme, we believe you have:**
* Graduated within the past two years, or will graduate before the programme starts on 1st September 2026 – from a relevant academic degree
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, and the ability to take ownership
* Great communication skills and to be able to work in English – you will need to translate technical concepts for non-technical stakeholders in this role
* A collaborative mindset with the ability to work across diverse teams
* A strong understanding of machine learning concepts and programming languages (Python, R or similar)
* Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI or similar)
* Passion for process optimization and continuous improvement


**It Is Also Meritorious If You Have**
* Modern development methodologies and software delivery practices
* Knowledge about LLMs and generative AI applications
* An understanding of DevOps metrics and delivery KPIs (lead time, deployment frequency, MTTR, change failure rate)


 Previous experience (part-time work, life abroad etc.) and involvement during your studies are advantageous but
 **what matters most is your potential and passion** 
 .
   

  

 In our recruitment, SEB behaviours are something we consider when choosing whom to hire. These behaviours include creating value, acting long-term, and building positive relationships.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

* A nine-month trainee programme, designed for professional and personal development
* A full-time employment in the role you have been hired for, after completing the programme successfully
* A real business challenge to solve with other participants in the International Trainee and Tech Trainee programmes, where you can create value and make a difference for SEB
* International exposure with opportunities to work at SEB offices in other countries
* A caring, supportive and respectful culture
* Chances to make an impact on social or environmental issues
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Mentorship from senior delivery and technology leaders


**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 The application period for the International Trainee programme is open until 11th January 2026 23:59 CET.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position, please contact career@seb.se, but we will not process applications via e-mail.
   

  

 The International Trainee programme will start on 1st September 2026.
   

  

**Our recruitment process**
 We want to get to know you, and for you to get to know us.
   

  

**The Recruitment Process Includes**
* Psychometric tests
* Interviews – digitally and/or on-site
* A case exercise and presentation
* SEB Day – an event to learn more about SEB and the programme, with insights from former trainees


 Please note that the Alva Labs assessments will be connected to the email you applied with.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and history of crime. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, which is why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Find out more about the International Trainee Programme here: International Trainee Programme | SEB
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Solutions Engineer, Splunk
description:
**Meet the Team**
 Splunk, a Cisco company, is building a safer and more resilient digital world with an end-to-end full stack platform made for a hybrid, multi-cloud world. Leading enterprises use our unified security and observability platform to keep their digital systems secure and reliable. Our customers love our technology, but it's our caring employees that make Splunk stand out as an amazing career destination. No matter where in the world or what level of the organization, we approach our work with kindness. So bring your work experience, problem-solving skills and talent, of course, but also bring your joy, your passion and all the things that make you, you. Come help organizations be their best, while you reach new heights with a team that has your back.
   

  

**Your Impact**
 This is an opportunity to work at a company that is changing the way information supports business decisions. At Splunk, we've grown rapidly across Europe by helping leading companies (including 90 of the Fortune 100) go from data to business outcomes faster than ever.
   

  

 Now, with the combined strength of Cisco and Splunk, we are accelerating innovation in AI-driven analytics and security, empowering customers to unlock even greater value from their data. Together, we are shaping the future of data and AI to solve complex business challenges at scale.
   

  

 Join us on our journey as Splunk Solutions Engineer, and enjoy a culture of inclusiveness, disruption, and fun while selling smart and winning big.
   

  

**Role Description**
* You will technically own, discover, position, prove and deliver the key technical elements of a sales cycle to achieve a ‘technical win’ within medium to large scale and complex customer environments. You’ll use a range of communication styles, a range of technology skills and experiences and a range of soft skills and people skills to develop trust relationships with both your sales colleagues and your customers.
* You will be an advocate and ambassador for Splunk through your professional social media, industry and marketing events and supporting pipeline generation activities
* You will collaborate with your customer contacts, and build them into Splunk champions, by helping them to understand how Splunk can help them to solve some of their most challenging problems and help them achieve their objectives.


**Responsibilities**
* Ability to demonstrate Splunk products and services to customers on site, remotely via webinar sessions, and at field events such as conferences and trade shows.
* Establish and maintain strong relationships throughout the sales cycle with all levels within the customer.
* Willing to travel to visit prospects and customers, and to engage in onsite customer work when required.
* Answer complex technical and competitive questions plus address customer concerns to a successful outcome.
* You should have experience with discovering pain and determining value with customers.
* You should be comfortable working for a dynamic technical organization with a rapidly expanding customer base.
* Collaborating with multiple Account Managers to explore opportunities simultaneously, driving discovery calls, and evaluating each prospect to identify the most promising next steps.


**Do these characteristics describe YOU?**
* Curiosity: You tend to want to understand the why of a scenario as much as the what and typically use a range of skills to discover whether the first response to the question really describes the situation or its implications
* Customer Success: Selling is great, but customers being successful with your solutions is one of your main motivations.
* Technically Astute: You enjoy the detail, even if you don’t always need to express it. You have a thirst for up-to-date knowledge of the technologies and solutions that businesses use to be successful as they transform.
* Confidence: But not arrogant – you have the confidence that comes from the knowledge that your product is rock solid, and the ability to transmit this confidence to a customer. That means you might sit down with a customer already using your product to show them how they might use it even better!
* Business Savvy: You understand how businesses are organized, how they achieve their desired results, what challenges they are likely to face, what solutions they need and what transformations they could make with your solutions.
* A growth mindset: You build in time to develop your skills, knowledge, experience or capabilities. You look beyond the current opportunity towards the wider set of opportunities that could exist in a prospect.
* A Collaborator: You understand that selling is a team game, so you spend time developing your network of colleagues and partners to achieve your success – and theirs.
* Competitive: If you’re in it, you want to win it!
* Fun: Getting the job done and enjoying & generating fun don’t need to be mutually exclusive.
* The candidate must be based in Sweden and be fluent in Swedish and English.


**Helpful technical skills or experience (not all required, but consider how Splunk could benefit from your background)**
* Domain knowledge and experience in IT infrastructure, Cloud Technologies, Application Delivery, Business Analytics, Log Management, Observability, and IT Security
* Insights in IT Operations: Experience with ITSM tools and ITIL processes such as incident, problem, and change
* Understanding of IT Monitoring, Security Monitoring, and Observability—including experience with tools for infrastructure, application performance (APM), and security event monitoring (SIEM) across logs, metrics, and traces
* Modern application architecture (microservices): Understanding or experience with Kubernetes, Docker, and/or Lambda/serverless
* Familiarity with DevOps concepts and hands-on experience in engineering/software development, using modern programming languages such as Java, Python, PHP, .NET, Ruby, js, Go, etc.


 Why Cisco?
   

  

 At Cisco, we’re revolutionizing how data and infrastructure connect and protect organizations in the AI era – and beyond. We’ve been innovating fearlessly for 40 years to create solutions that power how humans and technology work together across the physical and digital worlds. These solutions provide customers with unparalleled security, visibility, and insights across the entire digital footprint.
   

  

 Fueled by the depth and breadth of our technology, we experiment and create meaningful solutions. Add to that our worldwide network of doers and experts, and you’ll see that the opportunities to grow and build are limitless. We work as a team, collaborating with empathy to make really big things happen on a global scale. Because our solutions are everywhere, our impact is everywhere.
   

  

 We are Cisco, and our power starts with you.

title: QA Engineer
description:
At Umain, we're not just creating software; we're crafting the future, one innovative project at a time. With our motto "Shape, Ship, Scale," we empower our team to not only envision the future but also play a pivotal role in building it. We're a dynamic team where you can shape the future, ship groundbreaking solutions, and scale your abilities in many different ways.
   

  

 We're on the lookout for QA Engineers who see testing as more than checking features. You understand that the purpose of testing is to make risks visible and reduce uncertainty, and you care about improving not only the product but also how the team ensures quality.
   

  

 You enjoy methodical, structured testing, but you’re equally curious about automation and how to make testing smarter, faster, and better integrated into the delivery flow.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* A chance to work on unique projects that explore and push the boundaries of what's possible.
* A fun and fair work environment where your you have the opportunity to expand your skills through unique challenges and fantastic colleagues.
* A personal coach, and a setting where you can grow professionally and personally.
* Being part of multidisciplinary teams, participating in agile teams, being an important player in a highly ambitious setting.


 As a QA Engineer at Umain, your role will involve:
   

  

* Analysing user stories and requirements to identify risks and define test cases
* Design, execute, and maintain functional, regression, and exploratory tests
* Build and extend automated tests for UI, API, or backend
* Collaborate with developers to integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines
* Report and communicate quality insights, focusing on what the results mean
* Suggest and implement improvements in testing practices, tools, and processes


 What you bring
   

  

*Structured and analytical testing skills*
* Strong understanding of structured and risk-based test design, drawing on principles from frameworks such as ISTQB or TMAP
* Experience across different test levels including component, integration, system, and UAT
* Ability to design, prioritise, and maintain test cases based on business impact and risk


*Automation and technical mindset*
* Hands on experience with modern automation tools such as Cypress, Playwright, Appium or Postman
* Comfortable writing basic scripts in JavaScript, TypeScript, or Python
* Understanding of APIs, JSON, and CI/CD pipelines such as GitLab, Azure DevOps, or Jenkins
* Treats automation as part of the product codebase, versioned, reviewed, and maintained


*Collaboration and communication*
* Works closely with developers, designers, and product owners to clarify and test assumptions early
* Communicates findings clearly and constructively, focusing on understanding and action
* Helps stakeholders make informed release decisions by putting risks into context


*Ownership and continuous improvement*
* Takes initiative to improve how the team works instead of waiting for others to define it
* Brings ideas for smarter ways of testing or automating repetitive work
* Contributes to making quality a shared team responsibility


*Experience we’d love to see*
* 3 to 6 years of experience in QA, test engineering, or a similar quality focused role
* Experience working in agile, iterative delivery environments such as Scrum or Kanban
* Exposure to end to end digital product development across web, mobile, or backend systems
* Experience from consultancy or multi client projects is a plus
* Fluent in English; other languages are an advantage


 Why Umain?
   

  

* Career Framework: We believe in fairness and clarity, which is why we've established a transparent career framework to ensure equal pay and equal opportunities for all. Your growth and success are as important to us as they are to you. Together with your coach, you will build your own development plan and grow in your career.
* Work-Life Balance: At Umain, diversity is our strength. We understand that life doesn’t pause when you walk into the office. That's why we've cultivated an environment that supports an excellent work-life balance. We welcome team members from all walks of life, recognizing the richness that different backgrounds, ages, and life stages bring to our team. We're committed to supporting each other, encouraging a healthy work-life balance that respects your needs, whether it's taking care of your family, your pets, or yourself.
* Innovations and Learning: Technology is always evolving, bringing new challenges and opportunities for collaboration and learning. Our developers work closely with designers, analysts, testers and more to tackle these challenges head-on, sharing knowledge and growing together.
* Skills Over Degrees: We’re more interested in what you can do than in the diplomas you hold. Talent, drive, and creativity are what count at Umain. Here, you’ll find opportunities to grow, learn, and excel in your career, regardless of your educational background. If you have the ambition and commitment to succeed, we have the environment and resources to support your journey.


**Are You Ready to Shape, Ship, and Scale with Us?**
 If you're a QA Engineer who thrives on innovation, values a supportive and inclusive workplace, and is eager to make a tangible impact on the future, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s build something awesome together.
   

  

 Umain is a digital product consultancy. We shape, ship and scale digital products at speed. Founded in Stockholm in 2001, we are a growing team of 100+ experts in digital product strategy, design, and technology.
   

  

 We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.

title: Senior VMware Cloud Engineer
description:
We’re looking for a
 **Senior VMware Cloud Engineer** 
 to join us at Telia.
   

  

 I’m
 **Daniel Göthberg, the Head of Virtual Compute & Container** 
 within
 **the Tech Platform Services,** 
 and I’m searching for someone ready to grow with us. We’re a supportive, forward-thinking Cloud platform team focusing on
 **developing, maintaining and evolving Telia’s Private IT Cloud platform across the Nordics** 
 .
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
* Develop and maintain our VMware-based Private IT Cloud platform built on VCF, vRA, and Tanzu Kubernetes
* Delivering IaaS, PaaS, and CaaS services through a self-service portal
* Contribute to a National Security zone virtual team
* Take a leading role in NSX-T technology within the Cloud platform team


**What will help you thrive in this role:**
* Proven experience in VMware Cloud Foundation (VCF) and NSX-T (operations + architecture/design)
* Strong knowledge of AVI Load Balancer, Terraform, and networking concepts
* Ability to work in a security regulated environment handle incidents/change management
* Fluency in English


**Nice to have:**
* Experience with VCF Automation (vRA8) and Tanzu Kubernetes
* Familiarity with vROps, JIRA, GitHub, Ansible and Agile principles and SAFe framework
* General networking knowledge (Cisco)


**Important Information:**
* Swedish citizenship required
* Approved high-level security clearance (Telia/external parties)


**Join us to shape smarter living for people, businesses, and the planet!**
 At Telia, we’re a team of 15 000 colleagues across the Nordics and Baltics, passionate about technology and connectivity. As a
 **Leading Telecommunications Operator & Climate Leader** 
 , we drive change with large-scale, impactful projects while building a sustainable, inclusive world.
   

  

 Here, you can
 **grow your skills, lead meaningful projects, and thrive in a supportive, diverse environment** 
 . Whether you’re taking your first step or your next, Telia is a place to grow, belong, and make a real impact.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn a bonus based on your performance and Telia's results.
   

  

**Ready to make better happen?**
 We look forward to receiving your application by
 **January 9** 
 . Please note that we might close the position earlier if we find the right candidate, so don’t wait too long to apply!
   

  

 If you’re selected for the next stage, you’ll be contacted by our
 **Talent Acquisition Partner.** 
 Security clearance and reference checks will be part of the process.
   

  

 Want to know more about this role? Please reach out to
 **Daniel Göthberg** 
 at
 **daniel.gothberg@teliacompany.com** 
 .
   

  

**Equal opportunities**
 At Telia, we recognize talent by
 **professional skills and growth potential** 
 . We champion diversity, ensuring every individual’s needs are met, regardless of disability, gender, age, nationality, sexual orientation, or social status. Together, we’re dedicated to fostering an inclusive work environment where
 **your uniqueness is our strength.**
**Join us and let’s make better happen - together!**

title: IT Manager
description:
Mentimeter is an engagement tool with a clear goal in mind. To turn presentations into conversations. Through real-time interactivity and clear visualizations, we get people to participate, engage and become more productive. Transforming all those passive meetings, airless classrooms and drawn out trainings into valuable and memorable moments.
   

  

 We truly believe that you achieve the best results by doing things together. And that successful leaders need to adopt a curious and collaborative mindset in order to get there. So with you at Mentimeter, you’ll be a big part of the ambition to help over 1 billion people listen, learn and work better together.
   

  

 As our next IT Manager, you’ll be at the heart of ensuring that Mentimeter’s global team has reliable, secure, and user-friendly tools to work and grow. You’ll lead our IT Operations team, guiding them through daily challenges and long-term improvements.
   

  

 You’ll report to the Security and IT Director and be operationally responsible for one team member within IT Operations — supporting and coordinating their work, but without formal line manager responsibility.
   

  

 Your mission is to build scalable and secure IT foundations that balance structure with agility — from managing vendors and access governance to improving automation and the employee tech experience. You’ll be a key driver in ensuring that Mentimeter’s IT landscape supports our growth and global expansion while keeping collaboration effortless and secure.
   

  

 If you’re motivated by empowering teams through smart systems, efficient processes, and a human-first approach to technology, this is your opportunity to make a real impact.
   

  

 Please note that this position is located onsite at our office in Stockholm, with the starting date being flexible yet ideally as soon as possible.
   

  

**Responsibilities For The Role**
* Lead and support the IT Operations team, driving structure, clarity, and knowledge sharing.
* Oversee IT support delivery, documentation, and automation to ensure an excellent employee experience.
* Procure and Manage vendor and third-party relationships, including SaaS, hardware, and service providers.
* Develop and maintain access governance and identity management processes.
* Manage asset lifecycle, including procurement, inventory, and onboarding/offboarding processes.
* Oversee IT budget coordination and identify cost optimization opportunities.
* Collaborate closely with People Ops, Workplace, Security, and Engineering to align IT with company-wide needs.


**Responsibilities Not Included In The Role**
* You won’t be managing Mentimeter’s product or engineering infrastructure — this role focuses on internal IT operations only.
* You won’t own strategic information security or compliance frameworks, though you’ll collaborate closely with Information Security and own controls related to compliance frameworks.
* You won’t be directly responsible for software development, DevOps, or data engineering activities.


**Resources we have to support you**
* A dedicated and skilled IT Operations and Information Security team.
* A collaborative cross-functional setup with People Ops, Workplace, Security, and Engineering.
* Access to modern tools and systems — with support from experienced Mentimeter colleagues globally.
* A culture that values experimentation, autonomy, and continuous improvement.


**Must Haves For The Role**
* Experience leading IT operations in a growing, fast-paced, or global environment.
* Strong knowledge of Mac and Google-based environments.
* Strong knowledge of IT infrastructure, SaaS environments, and identity/access management.
* Experience with vendor management and contract negotiations.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with a user-focused mindset.
* Ability to balance strategic thinking with hands-on execution.


**Nice To Have**
* Experience working in a SaaS or tech company with a hybrid or global workforce.
* Familiarity with compliance frameworks and security standards (e.g., ISO 27001, SOC 2).
* Experience driving automation and self-service within IT support.


**Not Required**
 Deep engineering or DevOps experience — this is an operational IT role focused on internal infrastructure, not product systems.
   

  

**What Mentimeter Can Offer**
 At Mentimeter we can offer a diverse and inclusive work environment supported by smart and driven colleagues. We believe in continuous professional development for all of our colleagues and therefore offer access to a leadership program (including external personal coach) and relevant education to ensure that we continue to be state-of-the-art when it comes to innovating and building Mentimeter. Your place will be in a growing company with lots of career opportunities, working on a beloved product used by more than 300 million people. It’s not all about work though, we also offer a very healthy view on work-life balance.
   

  

 All of this comes attached with a competitive compensation and benefits package, including pension contributions. Learn more about our benefits by visiting our Benefits & Perks page
   

  

**AI and Hiring at Mentimeter**
 At Mentimeter, we believe AI helps us work smarter - but it never replaces the human assessment, curiosity, and personal connection that define our culture and our hiring. We use AI as a sparring partner: to bounce ideas, bring new perspectives, support structure, and make our work more efficient. But the meaning, decisions, and interactions always come from people.
   

  

* AI does not screen or decide on candidates.
* There is no automated filtering, ranking, or decision-making in our recruitment process. Every application is reviewed by a person.
* Hiring teams may use AI to support their work - for example, to structure notes, prepare interview questions, or organize their thinking.


 AI strengthens our work, but it does not define it. At Mentimeter, we’re not building an AI-driven hiring process - we’re building a people-first culture, where technology helps us listen, learn, and grow together.
   

  

**Culture at Mentimeter**
 At Mentimeter we believe in giving everyone a voice - regardless of who you are. So we build a platform that does just that. Our platform is not only our product but also our organization. A platform where people feel safe, where differences are embraced, a place where you can have fun. We strongly encourage applicants who are people of color, LGBTQ+, women, people with disabilities, and/or formerly incarcerated people, and a college degree is not strictly required. In order to give everyone a voice, we need to be as diverse as our users.
   

  

 Learn more about our culture by visiting our Culture page.
   

  

 Review our Privacy Policy for more information.

title: Summer Trainee Quality Assurance
description:
**Summer Trainee 2026 – Junior Quality Assurance Software Engineer Stockholm**
 Power the future with us! Are you ready to launch your career at the heart of the energy industry? Join Fortum as a Summer Trainee and make your mark on a more sustainable world. This is your chance to gain hands-on experience, work with cutting-edge technology, and help shape the future of energy!
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Summer Trainee, Junior Quality Assurance Software Engineer, you’ll be a vital part of our QA team. You’ll support quality assurance processes and tasks, gaining hands-on experience in a dynamic, real-world environment. Your main assignments will include:
   

  

* Assisting with quality assurance activities in ongoing projects
* Learning and applying industry-standard QA tools and testing frameworks
* Participating in test case creation, execution, and reporting
* Collaborating with experienced team members to identify and resolve issues
* Documenting findings and contributing to process improvements


**About You**
 We’re looking for recent graduates who are eager to learn and contribute to our purpose: powering a world where people, businesses, and nature thrive together.
   

  

* Pursuing a technical degree (e.g., Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or related field) with at least three years of studies completed
* Fluent in written and spoken English
* Hands-on experience or coursework in software development, testing, or quality assurance (familiarity with QA tools, scripting, or test automation is a plus)
* Committed to your work, a team player, and excited to learn new skills in quality assurance


**We Offer You**
* Practical experience in quality assurance within a corporate setting
* Exposure to modern QA tools and testing frameworks
* Opportunities to learn from experienced professionals
* Insight into software development and testing best practices
* A supportive environment to develop your skills and grow professionally
* Hybrid work model with flexible hours
* Networking opportunities with other trainees


**What To Expect**
 You’ll receive a thorough introduction and ongoing support from your team. You’ll work on real projects with real responsibility. The summer trainee period typically runs from May to September.
   

  

**Interested?**
 If this sounds like the perfect opportunity for you, send your CV through our recruitment tool by February 13, 2026. For further information about the role, please contact the hiring manager Anne Marie Palm, anne.marie.palm@fortum.com, +46 764 94 04 16. We encourage you to apply as soon as possible! We will start reviewing applications during the application period, and the job ad will close as soon as the right candidate is found.
   

  

**About Fortum**
 Fortum is a Nordic energy company. We generate and deliver reliable energy to our customers and the Nordic energy system while helping industries decarbonise their processes and grow. Our core operations comprise efficient and best-in-class low-carbon power generation, customer services, and heating and cooling. Fortum’s power generation is already 99% from renewable or nuclear sources, with one of the lowest specific CO₂ emissions in Europe. We are guided by our ambitious SBTi-validated emission reduction targets on our way towards net-zero by 2040. For our :4,500 employees, we commit to being a safe and inspiring workplace. Fortum's share is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki. fortum.com

title: Junior mjukvaruutvecklare
description:
**Professional Galaxy** 
 är ett IT och teknikkonsultbolag som tillhandahåller högspecialiserad kompetens inom IT, utveckling, elektronik och mekanik konstruktion. Vi arbetar med seniora experter och levererar strategiskt värdeskapande kompetens till några av Sveriges mest komplexa och samhällskritiska projekt. Vårt fokus ligger alltid på hög kvalitet, professionalism och mätbara resultat.
   

  

 Är du rätt person för uppdraget, eller vill du rekommendera en stark kandidat? Tveka inte att kontakta oss.
   

  

 Ansök gärna redan idag – urval och intervjuer sker löpande.
   

  

 Professional Galaxy söker en
 **Junior mjukvaruutvecklare** 
 på uppdrag av vår klient.
   

  

 Vi söker en junior mjukvaruutvecklare för utveckling av realtidskritiska delar i marina ledningssystem.
   

  

* 1-3 års erfarenhet av Java, C/C++ och gärna ADA
* Erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling som inkluderar kravinhämtning och testutveckling
* Mycket goda kunskaper i Svenska och Engelska


 Heltid på plats i kundens lokaler. Urval av kandidater sker löpande. Mycket goda möjligheter till förlängning.
   

  

 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar med krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
   

  

**Övrig information**
**Arbetsmodell:** 
 På plats
   

  

**Möjlighet till förlängning:** 
 Ja
   

  

**Uppdragsperiod:** 
 2026-02-16 – 2026-08-31
   

  

**Sista ansökningsdag:** 
 2026-01-15
   

  

 Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna. Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.
   

  

 Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället.

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare i AI Solutions
description:
**Mjukvaruutvecklare till AI Solutions på SAAB Surveillance Fighter Core Capabilities**
 Vill du arbeta med avancerad teknik som skyddar piloter, stärker Sveriges försvar och värnar demokratiska värderingar? Hos SAAB får du verka i en dynamisk och högteknologisk miljö där du tillsammans med kompetenta kollegor utvecklar mjukvara för försvarssystem i världsklass. SAAB är en global aktör inom försvars- och säkerhetsteknologi med verksamhet inom flyg, mark, marin och cybersäkerhet, och befinner sig i stark tillväxt med fokus på innovation. Här arbetar du nära teknikens framkant och bidrar till samhällsviktiga lösningar som gör verklig skillnad.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Vi söker en mjukvaruutvecklare till sektionen AI Solutions på SAAB. I rollen arbetar du med utveckling av komponenter i och kring AI-baserade radarvarnarsystem för stridsflygplan. Systemen identifierar och analyserar hot i realtid och ger piloter beslutsstöd i kritiska situationer. Du blir en del av ett tekniskt avancerat område där säkerhet, prestanda och kvalitet är centrala.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 I rollen ingår att:
   

  

* Backendutveckling för dataförädling och dataanalys
* Utveckla och underhålla data- och CI/CD-pipelines
* Jobba med simulerad EW data för träning av AI-modeller
* Evaluera och jämföra AI baserad signalbehandling med traditionella EW algoritmer
* Samarbeta med andra utvecklare och ingenjörer internt samt hos partners och kunder


**Kompetensområden**
 Vi söker dig med:
   

  

* Starka kunskaper inom backendutveckling i Python och ramverk som Django eller Flask
* Frontendramverk såsom React, Angular eller Vue.js
* Data pipelines med exempelvis Apache Airflow, Prefect eller liknande
* Dataanalys och visualisering med Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib
* Grundläggande kunskaper inom DevOps, inklusive Docker, Kubernetes och CI/CD


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av molntjänster som Azure och/eller AWS
* Kunskap inom elektronisk krigföring (EW) inklusive förståelse för sensorer, signalmiljöer, hotbibliotek och grundläggande signalanalys
* Erfarenhet av dataplattformar som Palantir, Hopsworks eller Databricks
* Bakgrund från Saab eller annan försvarsrelaterad verksamhet


**Personliga egenskaper**
* Kommunikativ och van att samarbeta i tvärfunktionella team
* Analytisk, lösningsorienterad och bekväm med komplexa tekniska utmaningar
* Flexibel och trivs i en dynamisk miljö med flera parallella projekt
* Nyfiken på data, AI och nya teknologier
* Bekväm med att arbeta i internationella team och anpassa dig till olika kulturer och arbetssätt


**Utbildning och erfarenhet**
* Högskoleutbildning inom teknisk fysik, datavetenskap, mjukvaruutveckling eller motsvarande
* 3–5 års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling


**Övrig information**
* Plats: Solna Strand
* Omfattning: Heltid, huvudsakligen på plats på kontoret
* Sista ansökningsdag: 20 januari


**Vad du blir en del av**
 Upptäck oändliga möjligheter. Anta utmaningar, skapa smarta innovationer och uppgradera dina förmågor. Det här är en plats för kluriga tänkare, modiga pionjärer och alla däremellan. Tillsammans uppnår vi det extraordinära, var och en tar med sitt unika perspektiv. Varje bidrag räknas.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 26,100 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här

title: AI Performance Engineer - GPU
description:
**WHAT YOU DO AT AMD CHANGES EVERYTHING**
 At AMD, our mission is to build great products that accelerate next-generation computing experiences—from AI and data centers, to PCs, gaming and embedded systems. Grounded in a culture of innovation and collaboration, we believe real progress comes from bold ideas, human ingenuity and a shared passion to create something extraordinary. When you join AMD, you’ll discover the real differentiator is our culture. We push the limits of innovation to solve the world’s most important challenges—striving for execution excellence, while being direct, humble, collaborative, and inclusive of diverse perspectives. Join us as we shape the future of AI and beyond.
 **Together, we advance your career.**
**The Role**
 As an AI Performance Engineers you will focus on pushing machine learning workloads to peak hardware efficiency. The emphasis of this call is on analysis, profiling, debugging and optimization at application/workload-level; however a broad understanding of low-level GPU execution and kernel optimization is a major advantage.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Explore and benchmark ML models and workloads (including diffusion models, LLMs, and multimodal systems) to identify bottlenecks across compute, memory, and networking layers.
* Optimize performance for inference and training on AMD GPUs, including parallelization strategies, quantization techniques, serving orchestration, network communication and distributed execution.
* Perform deep profiling to uncover inefficiencies in ML frameworks, data pipelines, compiler tools, and key tensor operations such GEMMs, Convs and Attention, to name a few.
* Support AMD top-tier customers to improve model throughput, reduce latency, and optimize resource utilization across multi-GPU and cluster environments.
* Work closely with hardware, compiler, and software teams to drive improvements across the full ROCm stack
* Communicate performance bottlenecks, solutions, and optimization strategies to stakeholders.
* Work with international teams located across Europe, US and Asia.


**Example Tasks For The First 6 Months**
* Benchmark and profile the latest e.g. DeepSeek model on single- and multi-GPU AMD systems.
* Identify top bottlenecks (e.g. gemms, moe, attn, vae) and drive improvements to reach peak performance.
* Evaluate competing hardware (other GPUs, TPUs, NPUs...) to understand where we lead and where we fall behind.
* Contribute improvements to popular inference and training frameworks such vLLM, SGLang, xDiT, Primus.
* Produce ambitious performance uplift plans, and execute them with your team.


**Ideal Candidate Profile**
* Running the latest Frontier AI workloads (LLMs, diffusion, multimodal) at scale.
* Profiling, debugging and optimizing complex ML workloads on PyTorch and JAX.
* High-performance networking for AI infrastructure (RDMA, InfiniBand, RoCE, UCX).
* Strong understanding of GPU architectures and performance trade-offs on AI workloads.
* Disaggregated LLM serving systems (KVCache management, prefill-decode separation, GPU-direct).
* Pre-training, fine-tuning, instruct-tuning, LoRa and other training-related experiences.
* You are proactive, a self-starter, and passionate about delivering performance improvements at scale.


**Required Skills & Qualifications**
* Experience with profiling, debugging, benchmarking, and optimization tools.
* Familiarity with ML frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, JAX, TF) and inference serving frameworks (e.g., vLLM, SGLang).
* Strong C++ and/or Python skills, along the basics: unix, git, terminal, debugging, testing, thinking...
* Experience with Docker, container orchestration (Kubernetes), and job schedulers (Slurm).
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a multi-cultural team.
* Excellent communication skills in a fast-moving environment.


**Nice To Have**
* Experience with AMD tooling (not mandatory if strong fundamentals).
* GPU kernel development experience with HIP, CUDA, or OpenCL
* Tile-programming experience (Triton, Pallas, Gluon, Cutlass, cuDSL...)
* Experience in multi-GPU cluster environments (single- and multi-node).
* Background in high-performance networking for AI infrastructure.
* Familiarity with compiler backends or code generation.
* Experience with KVCache optimization and memory hierarchy tuning.


**Academic Credentials**
* BSc, MSc, PhD or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or a related field


*Benefits offered are described:* 
 AMD benefits at a glance
 *.*
*AMD does not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters, recruitment agencies, or fee-based recruitment services. AMD and its subsidiaries are equal opportunity, inclusive employers and will consider all applicants without regard to age, ancestry, color, marital status, medical condition, mental or physical disability, national origin, race, religion, political and/or third-party affiliation, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, military or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. We encourage applications from all qualified candidates and will accommodate applicants’ needs under the respective laws throughout all stages of the recruitment and selection process.*

title: Tech Lead Manager to Sinch
description:
**About The Job**
 This is a direct recruitment, which means that the recruitment process takes place through Bravura and you are employed directly by Sinch.
   

  

**About The Company**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch’s Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we “Dream Big”, “Win Together”, “Keep it simple”, and “Make it Happen”. These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Tasks And Responsibilities**
 Sinch is seeking a Tech Lead Manager to guide their In-App Calling team. This is a unique 50/50 hybrid role where you will lead a full-stack team responsible for the critical client-side SDKs and backend services that enable seamless in-app voice and video calling within our customers' applications. You will be instrumental in shaping our technical landscape and fostering the growth of our people.
   

  

 You will be empowered to drive excellence across two key areas:
   

  

**As a People Leader (50%):**
* Cultivate a high-trust, inclusive engineering culture through dedicated coaching, continuous feedback, and personalised career development plans for each team member.
* Define clear team objectives, remove obstacles, and ensure your team is motivated, engaged, and aligned with our strategic goals.
* Champion a collaborative environment where continuous learning and shared ownership are paramount.


**As a Hands-On Engineer (50%):**
* Dedicate half your time to designing, coding, and delivering features for our core backend services, leveraging your expertise in technologies like .NET.
* Lead by example in code reviews, architectural discussions, and by evangelizing best practices in software craftsmanship.
* Actively contribute to and improve our DevOps culture, including our CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code, and Kubernetes deployments.


****Education,** 
 experience and personal characteristics**
* Deep Technical Extensive hands-on experience in backend development with a history of building scalable, production-grade systems on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
* Demonstrable experience in a formal or informal leadership capacity (e.g., as a manager, team lead, or senior mentor) and a genuine desire to help engineers grow their careers.
* The ability to articulate complex technical ideas clearly in English, build consensus, and inspire a team toward a common goal.
* A Servant-Leader Mindset: You are proactive, collaborative, and view your primary role as enabling your team to do its best work.


****What** 
 Success Looks Like**
* Within 3 Months, You'll... have built strong relationships with your team, shipped your first significant piece of code, and established a solid partnership with your Product Manager to align on the roadmap.
* Within 6 Months, You'll... be leading the delivery of a key team project, have established a cadence of meaningful career conversations, and be driving an initiative to improve your team's technical operations.
* Within 1 Year, You'll... be a trusted and indispensable leader, having demonstrably improved both your team's health and the quality of its technical deliverables while contributing to the strategic roadmap.


****Other** 
 information**
**Start:** 
 Upon agreement
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Salary:** 
 Upon agreement
   

  

 We use a competency-based method in all recruitment processes to ensure unbiased selection. We also work with ongoing selection, which means that we’ll take down the job ad when enough candidates have reached the final steps of the process.
   

  

 If you are considered for the position, we will contact you for an initial interview. Regardless of whether you proceed in the process or not, you will receive feedback on your application.
   

  

 If you have questions about the service or about your application, you are welcome to contact our support by emailing info@bravura.se or calling 010-171 47 10 and we will help you. Please indicate which service it applies to.
   

  

 We recommend that you submit your application immediately as we make a continuous selection.
   

  

 Welcome with your application!

title: Senior developer Dynamics 365 CE Stockholm
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
 Som ett av Europas ledande konsultbolag inom digital transformation och med ett av Sveriges största team inom Dynamics 365, Power Platform och BI gör vi mer än att följa trender, vi skapar dem.
   

  

 Med över 50 000 experter globalt och som certifierad och managerad Microsoft Cloud Partner på högsta nivån, har vi kompetensen och specialiseringar att leverera hållbara, smarta lösningar som gör verklig skillnad. På Sopra Steria förenar vi teknik och syfte för att driva digital transformation med Azure OpenAI, Copilot, BI, Dynamics 365 och Power Platform. Tillsammans med våra kunder förenklar vi processer, stärker kundrelationer och skapar värde för både verksamhet och samhälle. Genom att tillämpa AI där det ger störst effekt hjälper vi organisationer att ta nästa steg i sin digitala resa.
   

  

 Hos oss på Sopra Steria arbetar du med alla delar av utvecklingsprocessen, från koncept till implementation och förvaltning. Du får bryta ner komplexa problem och skapa anpassade lösningar till kunder med den allra senaste tekniken, med grund i Microsofts hela portfölj av tjänster. Som utvecklare rör vi oss över hela stacken, vilket gör att arbetsuppgifterna under en vecka kan variera. Att arbeta med Microsofts paraply av molntjänster, som dessutom ständigt utökas, gör att du kan bli specialist inom ditt kompetensområde, men ändå alltid ha mer att lära.
   

  

 Vi söker en person som vill vara med och driva den egna och andras utveckling, som vill agera mentor åt juniora, men också leda utvecklingsteam och vara ytterst ansvarig för den tekniska implementationen. Som utvecklare samarbetar man nära med den tekniska arkitekten för att säkerställa leveransens kvalitet.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifterna som utvecklare hos oss kan t.ex. innebära att:
   

  

* Anpassa funktionaliteten i Dynamics CE genom utveckling av tillägg i C# och klientanpassningar i JavaScript/TypeScript
* Skapa .NET Core-applikationer för att integrera till och från Dynamics CE
* Skapa low code-lösningar baserat på Power Apps och Power Automate
* Skapa förutsägbara och stabila releaser med verktyg som Azure DevOps, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy m.fl.


**Om dig**
 Vi söker både dig som har tidigare erfarenhet av .NET-utveckling inom Dynamics CE och dig som är erfaren .NET-utvecklare och nu vill bygga vidare på dina kunskaper!
   

  

**Antingen Har Du**
* 3 års erfarenhet som utvecklare backend, C# .NET
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Power Apps, Power Automate, Dataverse, Azure eller andra kringliggande tjänster inom området
* God kommunikativ förmåga i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift


**Eller**
* 5+ års erfarenhet som utvecklare backend, C# .NET
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta som konsult
* God kommunikativ förmåga i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift


 Det är även meriterande att ha erfarenhet och/eller intresse av Copilot studio och generativ AI.
   

  

**Varför välja Sopra Steria**
* Fokus på kompetensutveckling och din personliga utveckling - vi kallar det för Power of sharing
* Stark företagskultur - utsedda till Sveriges bästa arbetsplats av Great Place to Work
* Många teamleveranser!


**Ansök nu – vi ser fram emot att träffa dig!**
 Vi behandlar ansökningar och kallar till intervju löpande. På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation.
   

  

 Rekryteringsprocessen består av tre intervjuer, personlighet- och logiktest, referenstagning och bakgrundskontroll. Denna kombination av urvalsmetoder ger oss en bredare och mer rättvis bild av dig som kandidat, samtidigt som det säkerställer att både dina tekniska och personliga styrkor kommer till sin rätt. För dig som kandidat innebär det en möjlighet att visa din kompetens och potential från flera perspektiv.
   

  

 Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller oss som bolag är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryterare, Theresia, på theresia.wiclander@soprasteria.com
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Salesforce Systems Specialist
description:
**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture. Come join us— and let the world feel your work.**
 As a Salesforce Systems Specialist, you will play a crucial role in the CRM Systems team. Your role will be to translate complex Go-to-Market business needs into high-quality, scalable technical solutions across our GTM tech stack, with Salesforce as its core.
   

  

 The CRM Systems team's mission is to build and manage the core tech stack that powers our Enterprise Go-to-Market operations, directly supporting and empowering our Sales, Marketing, and Customer Success teams.You will be accountable for the end-to-end delivery of your solutions, guiding them from initial technical design and build through successful deployment and user adoption. Your work will be directly tied to our strategic roadmap, and you will be a critical player in major transformation initiatives. This is a high-impact opportunity to solve complex challenges that are critical to achieving key business results and company targets.
   

  

**Your key responsibilities include:**
* Design, build, and deploy robust, maintainable, and efficient solutions using our full GTM tech stack, including Salesforce, Gong, MCAE, Sales Navigator and other connected systems.
* Own the end-to-end delivery of user stories, from translating business needs into technical designs to testing, deploying, and monitoring changes in production.
* Continuously review, retrospect, and adapt, (re)learning and (re)iterating based on new knowledge and experience. Contribute to well-functioning collective ownership and decision-making, thinking and building smart for both present and future needs within our GTM tech stack.
* Handle complex technical issues by troubleshooting, fixing bugs, and ensuring the long-term health and performance of the delivered solutions.
* Actively participate in the team's agile processes, including peer reviews of declarative configurations to ensure high quality across the platform.


**Requirements**
* Strong expertise in Salesforce solution design and automation, with a mastery of declarative tools (especially Flow) and a commitment to best practices.
* Proven experience supporting B2B sales processes with systems and a deep understanding of the associated business logic.
* Demonstrated experience leading CRM system implementations, from business requirements to final solution design.
* Familiarity with modern deployment practices, including CI/CD processes for managing and deploying declarative changes.
* Senior-level consultative skills, including the ability to conduct workshops, lead requirement intake sessions, and clearly define project scope.


**Nice to have**
* Previous experience in a consulting role, with a focus on Salesforce or CRM systems.
* Deep experience with CPQ (Configure, Price, Quote)/RLM or quote-to-cash processes is a significant advantage.


**Equal opportunity employer**
 We believe that bringing people together from different backgrounds, experiences and perspectives makes for a healthy workplace, a more successful business and a better world. We value diversity and encourage everyone to come and soundtrack the world with us.
   

  

**Application**
 Ready to make the world feel your work? Please apply, in English, by clicking the link below.
   

  

***Welcome to Tune In - our behind-the-scenes video series where we sit down with the brilliant minds shaping the sound and story of Epidemic Sound. In this episode Oscar Höglund, CEO and Co-Founder of Epidemic Sound sits down with Rikard Herlitz, Chief Tech Officer where he shares what makes developers most happy, what velocity means to him and how Epidemic Sound is in the sweet spot when it comes to AI.Thinking about joining us? Tune in - and see if we sound like your kind of vibe.***
**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture. Come join us—and let the world feel your work.**

title: Fullstackutvecklare
description:
*Vill du vara med och forma framtidens digitala försäkringslösningar? Nu söker Agria två erfarna fullstackutvecklare som vill ta en nyckelroll i utvecklingen av vår moderna webblösning. Hos oss får du arbeta i ett engagerat team där din tekniska kompetens och ditt driv verkligen gör skillnad. Vi erbjuder dig möjligheten att påverka och utveckla en plattform som används av tusentals kunder varje dag. Låter det spännande? Då vill vi gärna veta mer om dig!*
**Om jobbet**
 Som fullstackutvecklare hos Agria blir du en viktig del av vårt tvärfunktionella team där du får arbeta med hela kedjan – från idé till drift. Du kommer att vara med och utveckla vår moderna försäkringsplattform och bidra till att skapa effektiva, säkra och användarvänliga lösningar för våra kunder.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer vara bland annat:
   

  

* Leda teknisk design och utveckling av vår Single Page Application (SPA) med microfrontends i TypeScript.
* Ansvara för hela lösningen – från användargränssnitt till integrationer mot .NET-backend, försäkringssystem och GKL Cloud.
* Migrera och etablera lösningen i Azure, inklusive CI/CD-flöden, loggning, övervakning och driftsäkerhet.
* Implementera säker autentisering och behörighetsflöden (token handler, OAuth) i både frontend och backend.
* Vidareutveckla affärskritiska flöden såsom ärendehantering, skade- och försäkringshistorik, rabatter, betalningar (e-faktura, delbetalning, Autogiro), aviseringar, utbetalningar och policyflöden.
* Säkerställa prestanda, tillgänglighet och kodkvalitet genom robust komponentarkitektur, kodstandard och automatiserade tester.
* Skriva tester, genomföra kodgranskningar och driva teknisk kvalitet i teamet.
* Samarbeta nära Product Owner, backendutvecklare, testare samt med andra team inom SAFe-ramverket.


 Följande kommer göra dig framgångsrik i denna tjänst:
   

  

* Stark kompetens inom TypeScript, SPA och microfrontends.
* Goda kunskaper i .NET (C#), REST-API:er och integrationer.
* Erfarenhet av Azure och DevOps-principer, inklusive CI/CD.
* God förståelse för frontend- och API-säkerhet (OAuth, tokenbaserad autentisering).
* Erfarenhet av agilt arbete, gärna enligt SAFe, och samarbete över teamgränser.


 Meriterande är även om du har:
   

  

* Försäkringskompetens, särskilt inom djur- eller sakförsäkringar.


 Som person är du lösningsorienterad, initiativtagande och har en stark vilja att utvecklas tillsammans med ditt team. Du trivs i en miljö där samarbete och kunskapsdelning är i fokus och har förmågan att se helheten i tekniska lösningar. Du är kommunikativ, prestigelös och bidrar gärna med nya idéer för att driva utvecklingen framåt.
   

  

 Kontaktuppgifter:
   

  

 Rekryterande chef: Poja Daroui
   

  

 Facklig representant Forena: emilie.mueller@agria.se
   

  

 Facklig representant Akademikerförbundet: ellinor.jateus@lansforsakringar.se
   

  

*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig!
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
 Agria är ett helägt dotterbolag till Länsförsäkringar och finns idag i Sverige, Norge, Finland, Danmark, Storbritannien, Tyskland, Frankrike och Irland. Vårt svenska kontor ligger på Gärdet i Stockholm, men vårt hjärta och verksamhet sträcker sig långt utanför Sveriges gränser. Med en tydlig tillväxt agenda fortsätter vi att expandera internationellt, driva innovation och utveckla digitala lösningar som gör verklig skillnad för djurägare. Ett exempel är vårt dotterbolag Agria Vet Guide, som erbjuder digital rådgivning och gör det enklare att hjälpa fler djur snabbare.
   

  

 Vi är marknadsledande i Norden inom djur- och husdjursförsäkringar, med en tydlig vision: att bli Europas mest omtyckta och pålitliga partner för djurägare. Vårt ledarskap handlar inte bara om marknadsandelar; det handlar om att skapa trygghet för både djur och människor, och att göra livet med djur enklare och roligare.

title: Sharepointutvecklare
description:
**Backgrund & Uppdragsbeskrivning:**
 Vi lanserade Sharepoint (On Prem) i Maj som plattform för samredigering av arbetsdokument. Vi har nu behov av en konsult som kan genomföra mindre utvecklingsaktiviteter samt stötta vår driftspersonal vid driftsfrågor.
   

  

 Rollen som Sharepointutvecklare (On Prem) innebär ta emot krav från verksamheten samt genomföra mindre utvecklingsaktiviteter t.ex. sätta upp landningssidor, automationer kring provisionering m.m. samt stötta driften vid driftsrelaterade frågor.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter:**
* Tillsammans med verksamheten arbeta med kravställning och dokumentation av kravställning
* Utvecklare av nya funktioner i vår Sharepoint On Prem-miljö
* Ta fram script för automationer i Powershell
* Hantera inkommande ärenden i vårt ärendehanteringssystem
* Lösa incidenter enligt SLA /OLA
* Dokumentera lösningar/rutiner för kända fel i kunskapsdatabasen
* Utbildning, dokumentation och kunskapsöverföring


**Nödvändiga färdigheter**
* SharePoint Onprem
* ActiveDirectory
* Kravhantering
* Sharepointutvecklare
* Windowsserver


**Meriterande färdigheter**
* Test
